an3.183-352:1.4: (…) → (rāgassa bhikkhave abhiññāya tayo dhammā bhāvetabbā. katame tayo? savitakkasavicāro samādhi, avitakkavicāramatto immersion, avitakkaavicāro samādhi. rāgassa bhikkhave abhiññāya ime tayo dhammā bhāvetabbā.) etthantare pāṭho katthaci dissati, aṭṭhakathāyaṁ
an3.183-352:4.1: Idamavoca bhagavā … → etthantare pāṭho sya-all, km, mr potthakesu na
